title: HELP!!!!!  CHANGED MY SUMMONER NAME BUT MISSPELLED IT
body: So recently I changed my name and it was gonna be NICKTHETHICK but i missed typed and put NICKTHETHCIK is there anyway i can contact riot and they can help me change it ????? PLEASE HELP

replies.body: Nick please tell us, what about you makes you "the thick"? Your people want to know {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Just something I was born with LOL {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
If this was accidental and didn't happen too long ago, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can see if there's anything we might be able to do.
Thanks you and yes it was an accident and i did it like 10min before I posted this
I think this is one of my favorite posts on the LoL boards now.
